scripts.build:ui: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd D:\fullstackopen\part2\phonebook\phonebook; npm run build; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dist D:\fullstackopen\part3\phonebook-backend"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild" && git push
